attributes.action: Make doctors surgery’s start face to face appointments
attributes.additional_details: Everyone in the uk is struggling to get face to face appointments because they are not giving any , all you can get is phone consultation and have to wait two weeks for one of them they are sitting behind there phones doing nothing for over two years now enough is enough , I asked my practice why they wasn’t operating normally when pandemic is over they said that’s how the doctors want it to stay it is desgusting how they won’t see patients , no one can make a diagnosis over the phone without seeing the patient , this would bring so much pressure of the hospitals if doctors (gp’s) did what they are getting paid for the public need your help
attributes.background: Make doctors surgery’s start operating normally as they did before covid

rejection.details: There are no Government restrictions that prevent GPs from holding face-to-face appointments. Decisions relating to GP appointments, including decisions on whether face-to-face appointments are appropriate, are operational matters for the NHS and individual GPs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
